verses.verse: Then all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> gathered <WH6908> to David <WH1732> at Hebron <WH2275> and said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2009> we are your bone <WH6106> and your flesh. <WH1320>

"In times <WH1571> <WH8032> <WH8543> past, <WH8543> <WH8032> even <WH1571> when Saul <WH7586> was king, <WH4428> you [were] the one who led <WH3318> out and brought <WH935> in Israel; <WH3478> and the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> said <WH559> to you, 'You shall shepherd <WH7462> My people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and you shall be prince <WH5057> over <WH5921> My people <WH5971> Israel. <WH3478>'"

So all <WH3605> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to the king <WH4428> at Hebron, <WH2275> and David <WH1732> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with them in Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> and they anointed <WH4886> David <WH1732> king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> according to the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> through <WH3027> Samuel. <WH8050>

Then David <WH1732> and all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> went <WH1980> to Jerusalem <WH3389> (that is, Jebus <WH2982>); and the Jebusites, <WH2983> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> [were] there. <WH8033>

And the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jebus <WH2982> said <WH559> to David, <WH1732> "You shall not enter <WH935> here. <WH2008>" Nevertheless David <WH1732> captured <WH3920> the stronghold <WH4686> of Zion <WH6726> (that is, the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>).

Now David <WH1732> had said, <WH559> "Whoever <WH3605> strikes <WH5221> down <WH5221> a Jebusite <WH2983> first <WH7223> shall be chief <WH7218> and commander. <WH8269>" And Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870> went <WH5927> up first, <WH7223> so he became <WH1961> chief. <WH7218>
Then David <WH1732> dwelt <WH3427> in the stronghold; <WH4679> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> it was called <WH7121> the city <WH5892> of David. <WH1732>

And he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892> all <WH5439> around, <WH5439> from the Millo <WH4407> even to the surrounding <WH5439> area; <WH5439> and Joab <WH3097> repaired <WH2421> the rest <WH7605> of the city. <WH5892>
And David <WH1732> became <WH1980> greater <WH1980> and greater, <WH1419> for the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> [was] with him.

Now these <WH428> are the heads <WH7218> of the mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had, who gave <WH2388> him strong <WH2388> support <WH2388> in his kingdom, <WH4438> together <WH5973> with all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> to make <WH4427> him king, <WH4427> according to the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> Israel. <WH3478>

And these <WH428> [constitute] the list <WH4557> of the mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> whom <WH834> David <WH1732> had: Jashobeam, <WH3434> the son <WH1121> of a Hachmonite, <WH2453> the chief <WH7218> of the thirty; <WH7970> he lifted <WH5782> up his spear <WH2595> against <WH5921> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> whom he killed <WH2491> at one <WH259> time. <WH6471>
And after <WH310> him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Dodo, <WH1734> the Ahohite, <WH266> who <WH1931> [was] one of the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men. <WH1368>

He was with David <WH1732> at Pasdammim <WH6450> when the Philistines <WH6430> were gathered <WH622> together there <WH8033> to battle, <WH4421> and there was a plot <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> full <WH4392> of barley; <WH8184> and the people <WH5971> fled <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the Philistines. <WH6430>

And they took <WH3320> their stand <WH3320> in the midst <WH8432> of the plot, <WH2513> and defended <WH5337> it, and struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> the Philistines; <WH6430> and the Lord <WH3068> saved <WH3467> them by a great <WH1419> victory. <WH8668>

Now three <WH7969> of the thirty <WH7970> chief <WH7218> men <WH7218> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the rock <WH6697> to David, <WH1732> into the cave <WH4631> of Adullam, <WH5725> while the army <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> was camping <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>
And David <WH1732> was then <WH227> in the stronghold, <WH4686> while the garrison <WH5333> of the Philistines <WH6430> [was] then <WH227> in Bethlehem. <WH1035>

And David <WH1732> had <WH183> a craving <WH183> and said, <WH559> "Oh <WH4310> that someone <WH4310> would give <WH8248> me water <WH4325> to drink <WH8248> from the well <WH953> of Bethlehem, <WH1035> which <WH834> is by the gate! <WH8179>"

So the three <WH7969> broke <WH1234> through <WH1234> the camp <WH4264> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and drew <WH7579> water <WH4325> from the well <WH953> of Bethlehem <WH1035> which <WH834> [was] by the gate, <WH8179> and took <WH5375> [it] and brought <WH935> [it] to David; <WH1732> nevertheless David <WH1732> would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> it, but poured <WH5258> it out to the Lord; <WH3068>

and he said, <WH559> "Be it far <WH2486> from me before <WH4480> my God <WH430> that I should do <WH6213> this. <WH2088> Shall I drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of these <WH428> men <WH376> [who went] at the risk of their lives <WH5315>? For at the risk of their lives <WH5315> they brought <WH935> it." Therefore he would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> it. These <WH428> things <WH428> the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> did. <WH6213>

As for Abshai <WH52> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> he was chief <WH7218> of the thirty, <WH7970> and he swung <WH5782> his spear <WH2595> against <WH5921> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and killed <WH2491> them; and he had a name <WH8034> as well as the thirty. <WH7970>
Of the three <WH7969> in the second <WH8147> [rank] he was the most honored, <WH3513> and became <WH1961> their commander; <WH8269> however, he did not attain <WH935> to the [first] three. <WH7969>

Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada, <WH3077> the son <WH1121> of a valiant <WH2428> man <WH376> of Kabzeel, <WH6909> mighty <WH7227> in deeds, <WH6467> struck <WH5221> down <WH5221> the two <WH8147> [sons of] Ariel <WH739> of Moab. <WH4124> He also went <WH3381> down <WH3381> and killed <WH5221> a lion <WH738> inside <WH8432> a pit <WH953> on a snowy <WH7950> day. <WH3117>

And he killed <WH5221> an Egyptian, <WH4713> a man <WH376> of [great] stature <WH4060> five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> tall. Now in the Egyptian's hand <WH3027> [was] a spear <WH2595> like a weaver's beam, <WH4500> but he went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to him with a club <WH7626> and snatched <WH1497> the spear <WH2595> from the Egyptian's hand, <WH3027> and killed <WH2026> him with his own spear. <WH2595>
These <WH428> [things] Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077> did, <WH6213> and had a name <WH8034> as well as the three <WH7969> mighty <WH1368> men. <WH1368>

Behold, <WH2009> he was honored <WH3513> among <WH4480> the thirty, <WH7970> but he did not attain <WH935> to the three; <WH7969> and David <WH1732> appointed <WH7760> him over <WH5921> his guard. <WH4928>
Now the mighty <WH1368> men <WH1368> of the armies <WH2428> [were] Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Joab, <WH3097> Elhanan <WH445> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> of Bethlehem, <WH1035>
Shammoth <WH8054> the Harorite, <WH2033> Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite, <WH6397>
Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite, <WH8621> Abiezer <WH44> the Anathothite, <WH6069>
Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite, <WH2843> Ilai <WH5866> the Ahohite, <WH266>
Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite, <WH5200> Heled <WH2466> the son <WH1121> of Baanah <WH1196> the Netophathite, <WH5200>
Ithai <WH863> the son <WH1121> of Ribai <WH7380> of Gibeah <WH1390> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite, <WH6553>
Hurai <WH2360> of the brooks <WH5158> of Gaash, <WH1608> Abiel <WH22> the Arbathite, <WH6164>
Azmaveth <WH5820> the Baharumite, <WH978> Eliahba <WH455> the Shaalbonite, <WH8170>
the sons <WH1121> of Hashem <WH2044> the Gizonite, <WH1493> Jonathan <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Shagee <WH7681> the Hararite, <WH2043>
Ahiam <WH279> the son <WH1121> of Sacar <WH7940> the Hararite, <WH2043> Eliphal <WH465> the son <WH1121> of Ur, <WH9003>
Hepher <WH2660> the Mecherathite, <WH4382> Ahijah <WH281> the Pelonite, <WH6397>
Hezro <WH2695> the Carmelite, Naarai <WH5293> the son <WH1121> of Ezbai, <WH229>
Joel <WH3100> the brother <WH251> of Nathan, <WH5416> Mibhar <WH4006> the son <WH1121> of Hagri, <WH1905>
Zelek <WH6768> the Ammonite, <WH5984> Naharai <WH5171> the Berothite, <WH1307> the armor <WH3627> bearer <WH5375> of Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah, <WH6870>
Ira <WH5896> the Ithrite, <WH3505> Gareb <WH1619> the Ithrite, <WH3505>
Uriah <WH223> the Hittite, <WH2850> Zabad <WH2066> the son <WH1121> of Ahlai, <WH304>
Adina <WH5721> the son <WH1121> of Shiza <WH7877> the Reubenite, <WH7206> a chief <WH7218> of the Reubenites, <WH7206> and thirty <WH7970> with him,
Hanan <WH2605> the son <WH1121> of Maacah <WH4601> and Joshaphat <WH3092> the Mithnite, <WH4981>
Uzzia <WH5814> the Ashterathite, <WH6254> Shama <WH8091> and Jeiel <WH3262> the sons <WH1121> of Hotham <WH2369> the Aroerite, <WH6200>
Jediael <WH3043> the son <WH1121> of Shimri <WH8113> and Joha <WH3109> his brother, <WH251> the Tizite, <WH8491>
Eliel <WH447> the Mahavite <WH4233> and Jeribai <WH3403> and Joshaviah, <WH3145> the sons <WH1121> of Elnaam, <WH493> and Ithmah <WH3495> the Moabite, <WH4125>
Eliel <WH447> and Obed <WH5744> and Jaasiel <WH3300> the Mezobaite. <WH4677>
